member.name: T:FlightPrices.Skyscanner.WebAPI.Clients.SkyscannerClient
member.summary:
Class SkyscannerClient faciliates communication with the Skyscanner API.
Implements the ISkyscanner interface.

The SkyscannerClient class constructor. The container for the Skyscanner API authentication key. The container for the Skyscanner Base URL, common to all requests. An ILogger implementation instance. An IHttpClientFactory implementation instance. The DbContext for the FlightPrices database.
Logs the values for the Skyscanner API Authentication Key and the Skyscanner Base URL. The parameters of this method are injected via the .NET Dependency Injection mechanism.

member.name: M:FlightPrices.Skyscanner.WebAPI.Clients.SkyscannerClient.GetAirports
member.summary:
Gets the collection of airports that can be used in a query.
This method eagerly loads the airports from the database.

member.name: M:FlightPrices.Skyscanner.WebAPI.Clients.SkyscannerClient.GetOneWayFlights(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary:
Gets the real-time one-way flight prices based on search criteria. The name of the origin The name of the destination airport. The date that the flight will depart from the origin airport.
>
This method makes an HTTP Request and is thus asynchronous.

member.name: M:FlightPrices.Skyscanner.WebAPI.Clients.SkyscannerClient.MakeHTTPRequest``1(System.String)
member.summary:
Make an HTTP GET request to the Skyscanner API. The url to append the Skyscanner base url.
This method makes an HTTP Request and is thus asynchronous. The HTTP client is served by the IHttpClientFactory instance. The Skyscanner responses are mapped to corresponding objects; these objects make it possible to make this algorithm generic.

member.name: M:FlightPrices.Skyscanner.WebAPI.Clients.SkyscannerClient.GetAirportFromAirportName(System.String)
member.summary:
Get the Airports objects from the database corresponding to the airportName The name of the airport to retrieve.
Thrown if the airport name does not match any Airports entry or if matches more than one.
There should be exactly one airports entry for each name.

member.name: M:FlightPrices.Skyscanner.WebAPI.Clients.SkyscannerClient.GetHttpClient
member.summary: Gets an HTTP Client from the IHttpClientFactory instance and configures it.
